additional_info:
Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Window guards, Duplex, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Exclusive, new modern duplex studio apartment in newly built 5-storey house, close to New School, in Bagebil. Total space 115 sqm. 35 sqm own yard with fireplace. Central heating, all necessary communication. Unlimited  car parking. The apartment is located in a green and family friendly residential area very close to the city centre. It is suitable for those who appreciate a stylish apartment, with peace and quiet. The apartment is perfect for couples, small family. Price 400 USD. Tel: 577473332

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake,  Bagebi, Uchaneishvili II pass.
